de.esoco.lib.comm.http

Class HttpRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.comm.http.HttpRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server.RequestHandler, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class HttpRequestHandler
extends org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
implements Server.RequestHandler
    A Server request handler implementation for HTTP requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler
      An interface for the handling of the distinct HTTP request methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequestHandler

        public HttpRequestHandler(org.obrel.core.Relatable rContext,
                          HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler rHandler)
        Creates a new instance with a certain request method handler.
        Parameters:
        rContext - The context for this request handler
        rHandler - The handler for the HTTP request methods

      • HttpRequestHandler

        protected HttpRequestHandler(org.obrel.core.Relatable rContext)
        Subclass constructor. If the subclass implements the HTTP request method handler interface HttpRequestHandler it will be set as the request method handler directly. Otherwise the handler must be set with setRequestMethodHandler(HttpRequestMethodHandler) before any requests are accepted or else a NullPointerException will occur.
        Parameters:
        rContext - The context of this request handler

    • Method Detail

      • getThreadLocalRequest

        public static final HttpRequest getThreadLocalRequest()
        Returns the active HTTP request for the current thread.
        Returns:
        The current thread's HTTP request or NULL if no request is handled by the thread

      • getContext

        public final org.obrel.core.Relatable getContext()
        Returns the context of this handler. The context is a Relatable object that provides access to relations containing configuration data. It may be readonly and should therefore not be modified by the receiver.
        Returns:
        The request handler context

      • getRequestMethodHandler

        public final HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler getRequestMethodHandler()
        Returns the handler for the HTTP request methods.
        Returns:
        The request method handler

      • handleRequest

        public java.lang.String handleRequest(java.io.InputStream rRequestStream,
                                      java.io.OutputStream rResponseStream)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Implements the handling of a single server request by reading the request from an input stream, processing it, and writing an adequate response to the given output stream. For each request a new instance is used so it is not necessary

        The implementation doesn't need to perform any kind of resource management with the given stream parameters. That will be done by the server implementation.

        Specified by:
        handleRequest in interface Server.RequestHandler
        Parameters:
        rRequestStream - The request input stream
        rResponseStream - The response output stream
        Returns:
        A string description of the handled request (used for statistical purposes)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • checkAuthentication

        protected void checkAuthentication(HttpRequest rRequest)
                            throws HttpStatusException
        Checks if authentication is needed and if so, whether the request contains the necessary authentication information.
        Parameters:
        rRequest - The request to check for authentication if necessary
        Throws:
        HttpStatusException - If authentication is required but not provided

      • createResponse

        protected HttpResponse createResponse(HttpRequest rRequest)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the HTTP response for a certain HTTP request. The default implementation invokes the method HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler.handleMethod(HttpRequest) of the request method handler.
        Parameters:
        rRequest - The request to create the response for
        Returns:
        The response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If handling the request method fails

      • getAuthErrorHeader

        protected de.esoco.lib.datatype.Pair<HttpHeaderTypes.HttpHeaderField,java.lang.String> getAuthErrorHeader()
        Returns a pair of header field name and value for an authentication error.
        Returns:
        The authentication error header

      • readRequest

        protected HttpRequest readRequest(java.io.InputStream rInput)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  HttpStatusException
        Reads the HTTP request from the given input stream. The default implementation just returns a new instance of HttpRequest containing the data from the stream.
        Parameters:
        rInput - The input stream to read the request from
        Returns:
        A new HTTP request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading from the input fails
        HttpStatusException - The corresponding HTTP status if the request violates requirements

      • sendResponse

        protected void sendResponse(HttpResponse rResponse,
                            java.io.OutputStream rOutput)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the HTTP response for an HTTP request through the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        rResponse - The HTTP response to send
        rOutput - The output stream to write the response to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If writing the output fails

      • setRequestMethodHandler

        protected final void setRequestMethodHandler(HttpRequestHandler.HttpRequestMethodHandler rHandler)
        Sets the handler for the HTTP request methods.
        Parameters:
        rHandler - The new request method handler
